accessStatistics.description-detail: Navigates to the statistics section to display the user\'s monthly weight data overview.

disableReminderVibration.description-detail: Navigates to settings to disable the app\'s reminder vibration feature for user notifications.

changeWeightUnit.description-detail: Changes the app\'s weight measurement unit to pounds in the user settings.

addNewFood.description-detail: Adds a new food item named "mushroom" to the app\'s food database for tracking nutrition.
